#include<iostream>
#include<cmath>
#define inf 1000000001
#define max(a,b) ((a>=b)?a:b)
#define minim(a,b) ((a<=b)?a:b)
using namespace std;
int times(int n)
{
    int i=0;
    while(n!=1)
    {
        if(n%2!=0)
        {
            n--;
            i++;
        }
        n=n>>1;
        i++;
    }
    return i;
}
int main(void)
{
    int i,j,k,l,n,m,t,min;
    cin>>t;
    while(t--)
    {
        min=inf;
        cin>>n;
        //cout<<times(n)<<endl;
        j=0;
        k=n;
        while(k!=1)
        {
            j++;
            k=k>>1;
        }
        //cout<<j<<endl;
        for(i=1;i<=j;i++)
        {
            k=pow(2,i);
            l=n%k;
            m=n-l;
            if(l==0);
            else
            {
            k=max(times(l),times(m));
            min=minim(min,k);
            }
        }
        //cout<<n<<endl;
        min=minim(times(n),min);
        //cout<<mini<<endl;
        if(n==pow(2,j))
        {
            //cout<<"perfect"<<endl;
            n/=2;
            min=minim(min,times(n));
        }
        cout<<min<<endl;
    }
    return 0;
}
